description:
With a solid resume of adventures behind it, the Tilley Hat is a Canadian icon. This ultralight version of the classic Tilley has a floating brim and UPF 50+ rated fabric to shield your head when there's no shelter in sight.

  • Lightweight recycled nylon fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection and a DWR finish to shed light rain
  • Quick-drying fabric is highly breathable
  • Medium-width foam brim keeps hat afloat should it fall in the water
  • Hidden crown pocket keeps small essentials safe while travelling
  • Packable design regains it's shape after being stuffed in your pack
  • Lifetime Guarantee against normal wear and tear
name: Tilley Ultralight T5 Classic Hat - Unisex
